Title: The Provision of Gibraltar Vessel Tracking System  (GVTS)
Description:
The Provision of Gibraltar Vessel Tracking System (GVTS), awarded to Thales UK Limited on 01/04/2019. A Contract Award Notice was published on the Official Journal of the European Union (OJEU) on 05/04/2019 under reference 2019/S 068-161129. 

In Service Date (ISD) is scheduled for 01/04/2020 with the provision of in-service support for a period of five years to 31/03/2025.  The Contract has an option for a technical refresh of GVTS and provision for a further five years of in-service support upon completion of the initial five year in-service phase.

Organisation Name: Ministry of Defence, Ships, Maritime Combat Systems (MCS) Team
Title: In-Service Support of the Fully Integrated Communications System
Description:
Fully Integrated Communications System In-Service Support for Type 45 Destroyers.

The United Kingdom Ministry of Defence (the “Authority”) intends to amend the existing communications system support contract with Thales UK Limited (company number 0868273) (the “Company”), reference FWS2D/1011, to cover communications system equipment fitted to in service Royal Navy Type 45 Destroyers (Type 45).

The term of the contract amendment is 7 (seven) months for the period 1 December 2016 to 30 June 2017.  This contract amendment will enable continuation of support for these in service equipments.  The estimated value of this contract amendment over the 7 (seven) month period is £3,000,000 (Three Million Pounds Sterling).

The contract amendment will cover the support of the Type 45 Fully Integrated Communications System (FICS) comprising of components, software, electronic and electrical sub-systems.

Organisation Name: Ministry of Defence, Helicopters, Chinook Project Team
Title: Ground Mission Support System (GMSS) Interim Support Contract
Description: An interim contract to support the Chinook Ground Mission Support System (GMSS) which will continue the current GMSS support arrangement to avoid a critical capability gap arising. It will aim to satisfy regulatory requirements and limit contractor rates and profits, refresh Contract Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) to align with current departmental policy, Upgrade GMSS as required by the Authority, Manage obsolescence issues that are likely to impact GMSS products within the future support period and will Provide a period prior to a longer term future support QDC contract which will fulfil User needs for a complete software rewrite.

Notice Identifier: TRANSPARENCY NOTICE OF CONTRACT AWARD: HIGH G TRAINING AND TEST CAPABILITY
Title: TRANSPARENCY NOTICE OF CONTRACT AWARD: HIGH G TRAINING AND TEST CAPABILITY
Description: Aircraft or spacecraft equipment, trainers, simulators and associated parts. This contract is for the manufacture, delivery, maintenance, operation and management of a High G Human Centrifuge facility located at RAF Cranwell, England and shall include delivery of both a building and centrifuge equipment. This High G Facility will deliver a capability to train Fast Jet (FJ) aircrew to cope with both the levels and rapid changes in G experienced during training and operations and provide a capability for equipment and medical testing.
Contact Address 1: FsAST PT DE&S ABBEY WOOD FILTON
